            time.sleep(2)  # Esperar entre descargas
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"âŒ Error exportando chat {index + 1}: {e}")

    def export_all_chats(self):
        """Exporta todos los chats automÃ¡ticamente"""
        print("ğŸš€ INICIANDO EXPORTACIÃ“N MASIVA...")
        
        self.login_if_needed()

        if not chat_elements:

        print(f"ğŸ“Š Exportando {len(chat_elements)} chats...")

    def organize_downloads(self):

        os.makedirs(target_folder, exist_ok=True)
        
        # Mover y renombrar archivos JSON
        for filename in os.listdir(download_folder):

                old_path = os.path.join(download_folder, filename)
                new_path = os.path.join(target_folder, new_name)
                
                os.rename(old_path, new_path)
                print(f"ğŸ“ Organizado: {new_name}")

        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=chrome_options)

        try:
            # Patrones de bÃºsqueda para Ã“pera
            history_buttons = [
                "//button[contains(@class, 'history')]",

    def export_all_chats(self):

        os.makedirs(target_folder, exist_ok=True)

class ChromeDeepSeekExporter:

        chrome_options.add_argument("--disable-blink-features=AutomationControlled")
        chrome_options.add_experimental_option("excludeSwitches", ["enable-automation"])
        chrome_options.add_experimental_option('useAutomationExtension', False)
        
        # Para mejor rendimiento
        chrome_options.add_argument("--no-sandbox")
        chrome_options.add_argument("--disable-dev-shm-usage")
        
        print("ğŸ”„ Iniciando Chrome...")
        return webdriver.Chrome(options=chrome_options)
    
    def login_to_deepseek(self):

    def find_all_chats(self):
        """Encuentra todos los chats disponibles"""
        print("ğŸ” Buscando todos los chats...")
        
        # MÃºltiples estrategias para encontrar chats
        chat_selectors = [
            "//div[contains(@class, 'chat-item')]",
            "//div[contains(@class, 'history-item')]",
            "//div[contains(@class, 'group')]//div[contains(@class, 'flex')]",
            "//div[contains(@class, 'conversation')]",
            "//div[role='button']",
            "//div[contains(@class, 'cursor-pointer')]"
        ]
        
        all_chats = []
        for selector in chat_selectors:
            try:
                chats = self.driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, selector)
                if chats:
                    print(f"ğŸ“ Encontrados {len(chats)} chats con selector: {selector}")
                    all_chats.extend(chats)
            except Exception as e:
                continue
        
        # Eliminar duplicados
        unique_chats = []
        seen_ids = set()
        for chat in all_chats:
            chat_id = chat.id
            if chat_id not in seen_ids:
                seen_ids.add(chat_id)
                unique_chats.append(chat)
        
        print(f"ğŸ¯ Total de chats Ãºnicos: {len(unique_chats)}")
        return unique_chats

    def export_chat(self, chat_element, index):
        """Exporta un chat individual"""
        try:

            # Hacer clic en el chat

            time.sleep(3)
            
            # Estrategia de exportaciÃ³n robusta

                self.exported_count += 1
                print(f"âœ… Chat {index + 1} exportado exitosamente")
                return True
            else:
                print(f"âŒ No se pudo exportar chat {index + 1}")
                return False
                
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"ğŸ’¥ Error en chat {index + 1}: {e}")
            return False

    def click_export_button(self):
        """Busca y hace clic en el botÃ³n de exportaciÃ³n"""
        export_attempts = [
            "//button[contains(., 'Export')]",
            "//button[contains(., 'Download')]",
            "//button[contains(@class, 'export')]",
            "//div[contains(@class, 'export')]//button",
            "//button[contains(@title, 'Export')]"
        ]
        
        for attempt in export_attempts:

                export_btn.click()

                # Seleccionar JSON

            except:

    def select_json_format(self):

        json_attempts = [
            "//div[contains(., 'JSON')]",
            "//button[contains(., 'JSON')]",
            "//input[@value='json']/..",
            "//label[contains(., 'JSON')]"
        ]
        
        for attempt in json_attempts:

                json_btn.click()

            except:

        return False

    def confirm_download(self):

        confirm_attempts = [

            "//button[contains(., 'Export')]",
            "//button[contains(., 'Save')]"
        ]

                confirm_btn.click()
                time.sleep(2)

            except:

        return False

    def export_all_chats(self, max_chats=10):

        print(f"ğŸ“Š Exportando hasta {min(max_chats, len(chats))} chats...")
        
        for i in range(min(max_chats, len(chats))):

            # Pausa cada 3 chats
            if (i + 1) % 3 == 0:
                print(f"â¸ï¸  Pausa despuÃ©s de {i + 1} chats...")
                time.sleep(3)
        
        return self.exported_count

    def organize_exports(self):
        """Organiza los archivos exportados"""
        downloads_path = os.path.expanduser("~/Downloads")
        export_folder = os.path.join(downloads_path, "DeepSeek_Kernels_Chrome")
        
        os.makedirs(export_folder, exist_ok=True)

            if "chat" in filename.lower() and filename.endswith(".json"):

                    moved_files += 1
                except Exception as e:
                    print(f"âŒ Error moviendo {filename}: {e}")

    def close(self):

        try:

        except:

            ]
            
            sidebar_found = False
            for selector in sidebar_selectors:
                try:
                    sidebar = self.driver.find_element(By.XPATH, selector)
                    sidebar.click()
                    print("âœ… Historial abierto en Chrome")
                    sidebar_found = True
                    time.sleep(2)
                    break
                except:
                    continue
            
            if not sidebar_found:
                print("âŒ No se pudo encontrar el historial")
                return []
            
            # Buscar elementos de chat
            time.sleep(3)
            chat_selectors = [
                "//div[contains(@class, 'chat-item')]",
                "//div[contains(@class, 'history-item')]",
                "//div[contains(@class, 'group')]//div[contains(@class, 'flex')]",
                "//div[contains(@class, 'conversation')]",
                "//div[role='button']"
            ]
            
            all_chats = []
            for selector in chat_selectors:
                chats = self.driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, selector)
                if chats:
                    all_chats.extend(chats)
                    print(f"ğŸ“„ Encontrados {len(chats)} chats con selector: {selector}")
            
            # Eliminar duplicados
            unique_chats = []
            seen_elements = set()
            for chat in all_chats:
                if chat.id not in seen_elements:
                    seen_elements.add(chat.id)
                    unique_chats.append(chat)
            
            print(f"ğŸ¯ Total de chats Ãºnicos encontrados: {len(unique_chats)}")
            return unique_chats
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"âŒ Error obteniendo chats: {e}")
            return []

    def export_single_chat(self, chat_element, index):
        """Exporta un chat individual en Chrome"""
        try:
            print(f"ğŸ”„ Intentando exportar chat {index + 1}...")
            
            # Hacer clic en el chat
            chat_element.click()
            time.sleep(4)  # MÃ¡s tiempo para Chrome
            
            # BUSCAR BOTÃ“N DE EXPORTACIÃ“N MÃS AGRESIVAMENTE
            export_found = False
            for i in range(3):  # Intentar 3 veces
                export_selectors = [
                    "//button[contains(., 'Export')]",
                    "//button[contains(., 'Download')]",
                    "//button[contains(@class, 'export')]",
                    "//div[contains(@class, 'export')]//button",
                    "//button[contains(@title, 'Export')]",
                    "//button[contains(@aria-label, 'export')]",
                    "//*[contains(text(), 'Export chat')]",

                ]
                
                for selector in export_selectors:
                    try:
                        export_btn = WebDriverWait(self.driver, 5).until(
                            EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.XPATH, selector))
                        )
                        export_btn.click()
                        print(f"âœ… BotÃ³n de exportaciÃ³n encontrado con: {selector}")
                        export_found = True
                        break
                    except:
                        continue
                
                if export_found:
                    break
                else:
                    print(f"ğŸ”„ Reintentando buscar botÃ³n de exportaciÃ³n... ({i+1}/3)")
                    time.sleep(2)
            
            if not export_found:
                print("âŒ No se encontrÃ³ botÃ³n de exportaciÃ³n despuÃ©s de 3 intentos")
                return False
            
            # Seleccionar formato JSON
            time.sleep(3)
            json_found = False
            json_selectors = [
                "//div[contains(., 'JSON')]",
                "//button[contains(., 'JSON')]",
                "//input[@value='json']/..",
                "//label[contains(., 'JSON')]",
                "//*[contains(text(), 'JSON') and not(contains(text(), 'JSON'))]"
            ]
            
            for selector in json_selectors:
                try:
                    json_btn = WebDriverWait(self.driver, 5).until(
                        EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.XPATH, selector))
                    )
                    json_btn.click()
                    json_found = True
                    print("âœ… Formato JSON seleccionado")
                    break
                except:
                    continue
            
            # Confirmar descarga
            time.sleep(3)
            confirm_selectors = [
                "//button[contains(., 'Download')]",
                "//button[contains(., 'Export')]",
                "//button[contains(., 'Save')]",
                "//button[contains(@class, 'download')]",
                "//button[type='submit']"
            ]
            
            for selector in confirm_selectors:
                try:
                    confirm_btn = WebDriverWait(self.driver, 5).until(
                        EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.XPATH, selector))
                    )
                    confirm_btn.click()
                    print("âœ… Descarga confirmada")
                    break
                except:
                    continue
            
            print(f"âœ… Chat {index + 1} exportado exitosamente")
            time.sleep(3)  # Esperar entre descargas
            return True
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"âŒ Error exportando chat {index + 1}: {e}")
            return False

    def export_all_chats(self, max_chats=5):
        """Exporta todos los chats automÃ¡ticamente en Chrome (con lÃ­mite)"""
        print("ğŸš€ INICIANDO EXPORTACIÃ“N MASIVA EN CHROME...")

        print(f"ğŸ‰ ExportaciÃ³n completada: {successful_exports}/{min(max_chats, len(chat_elements))} chats exportados")

    def organize_downloads(self):
        """Organiza descargas de Chrome"""
        download_folder = os.path.expanduser("~/Downloads")
        target_folder = os.path.join(download_folder, "DeepSeek_Exports_Chrome")
        
        os.makedirs(target_folder, exist_ok=True)
        
        moved_files = 0
        for filename in os.listdir(download_folder):
            if "chat" in filename.lower() and filename.endswith(".json"):
                timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d_%H%M%S")
                new_name = f"chrome_kernel_{timestamp}_{moved_files + 1}.json"
                
                old_path = os.path.join(download_folder, filename)
                new_path = os.path.join(target_folder, new_name)
                
                try:
                    os.rename(old_path, new_path)
                    print(f"ğŸ“ Organizado: {new_name}")
                    moved_files += 1
                except Exception as e:
                    print(f"âŒ Error moviendo {filename}: {e}")
        
        print(f"ğŸ“‚ Total de archivos organizados: {moved_files}")

    def close(self):
        """Cierra el navegador"""
        try:
            self.driver.quit()
        except:
            pass

def setup_chrome_with_profile():

    chrome_options.add_argument("--disable-blink-features=AutomationControlled")

    return webdriver.Chrome(options=chrome_options)

def organizar_archivos_auto():

from selenium import webdriver

def setup_chrome():
    """Configura Chrome para trabajo automÃ¡tico"""
    chrome_options = Options()

    chrome_options.add_experimental_option('useAutomationExtension', False)
    
    driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=chrome_options)
    driver.execute_script("Object.defineProperty(navigator, 'webdriver', {get: () => undefined})")
    return driver

def exportar_chats_automatico():
    """VersiÃ³n AUTOMÃTICA para Chrome"""
    print("ğŸš€ INICIANDO EXPORTACIÃ“N AUTOMÃTICA EN CHROME...")
    
    driver = setup_chrome()
    wait = WebDriverWait(driver, 15)
    
    try:
        # Paso 1: Ir a DeepSeek automÃ¡ticamente
        print("1. ğŸŒ Navegando a DeepSeek...")
        driver.get("https://chat.deepseek.com")

            "//button[.//*[contains(text(), 'History')]]"
        ]
        
        history_abierto = False
        for selector in history_selectors:
            try:
                history_btn = wait.until(EC.element_to_be_clickable((By.XPATH, selector)))
                history_btn.click()
                print("   âœ… Historial abierto automÃ¡ticamente")
                history_abierto = True
                time.sleep(2)
                break
            except:
                continue
        
        if not history_abierto:
            print("   âŒ No se pudo abrir el historial. Continuando...")
        
        # Paso 3: Encontrar chats AUTOMÃTICAMENTE
        print("3. ğŸ“‚ Buscando todos los chats...")

            "//div[contains(@class, 'conversation')]",
            "//div[role='button']"
        ]
        
        all_chats = []
        for selector in chat_selectors:
            chats = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, selector)
            if chats:
                all_chats.extend(chats)
        
        # Eliminar duplicados
        unique_chats = []

        for chat in all_chats:

            if chat_id not in seen_ids:
                seen_ids.add(chat_id)
                unique_chats.append(chat)
        
        print(f"   ğŸ“„ Encontrados {len(unique_chats)} chats")
        
        # Paso 4: Exportar AUTOMÃTICAMENTE los primeros chats (por ejemplo, 5)
        print("4. ğŸš€ Exportando chats automÃ¡ticamente...")
        exportados = 0

                print(f"   ğŸ“¤ Exportando chat {i+1}...")

                # Buscar botÃ³n Export/Download automÃ¡ticamente
                export_buttons = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, "//button[contains(., 'Export') or contains(., 'Download')]")
                if export_buttons:
                    export_buttons[0].click()
                    time.sleep(2)
                    
                    # Seleccionar JSON automÃ¡ticamente
                    json_options = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, "//*[contains(., 'JSON')]")
                    if json_options:
                        json_options[0].click()
                        time.sleep(1)
                    
                    # Confirmar automÃ¡ticamente
                    confirm_buttons = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, "//button[contains(., 'Download') or contains(., 'Save')]")
                    if confirm_buttons:
                        confirm_buttons[0].click()
                        print(f"   âœ… Chat {i+1} exportado automÃ¡ticamente")
                        exportados += 1
                        time.sleep(2)
                
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"   âŒ Error en chat {i+1}: {e}")
                continue
        
        print(f"5. ğŸ“ ExportaciÃ³n completada: {exportados} chats exportados")
        return exportados > 0
        
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"ğŸ’¥ Error en automatizaciÃ³n: {e}")
        return False
    finally:
        driver.quit()

def setup_chrome():
    chrome_options = Options()
    chrome_options.add_argument("--disable-blink-features=AutomationControlled")
    chrome_options.add_experimental_option("excludeSwitches", ["enable-automation"])
    return webdriver.Chrome(options=chrome_options)

def extract_chat_text(driver):
    """Extrae el texto del chat actual"""
    try:
        # Esperar a que cargue el chat
        time.sleep(3)
        # Buscar los mensajes en el chat
        messages = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, "//div[contains(@class, 'message') or contains(@class, 'prose')]")
        chat_text = []
        for msg in messages:
            chat_text.append(msg.text)
        return chat_text
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Error extrayendo chat: {e}")
        return []

def main():
    driver = setup_chrome()
    try:
        driver.get("https://chat.deepseek.com")
        time.sleep(5)
        
        # Buscar y abrir el historial
        history_buttons = [
            "//button[contains(@class, 'history')]",
            "//button[contains(text(), 'History')]",
            "//div[contains(@class, 'sidebar')]//button"
        ]
        
        for button_xpath in history_buttons:
            try:
                history_btn = driver.find_element(By.XPATH, button_xpath)
                history_btn.click()
                time.sleep(2)
                break
            except:
                continue
        
        # Buscar los chats en el historial
        chat_elements = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, "//div[contains(@class, 'chat-item')]")
        if not chat_elements:
            chat_elements = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, "//div[contains(@class, 'group')]//div[contains(@class, 'flex')]")
        
        print(f"Encontrados {len(chat_elements)} chats")
        
        all_chats_data = []
        
        for i, chat in enumerate(chat_elements):
            try:
                print(f"Procesando chat {i+1}")
                chat.click()
                time.sleep(3)
                
                # Extraer el texto del chat
                chat_text = extract_chat_text(driver)
                all_chats_data.append({
                    "chat_index": i+1,
                    "content": chat_text
                })
                
                # Guardar cada chat en un archivo JSON
                with open(f"chat_{i+1}.json", 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                    json.dump(chat_text, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
                    
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"Error en chat {i+1}: {e}")
                continue
        
        # Guardar todos los chats en un archivo
        with open("all_chats.json", 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            json.dump(all_chats_data, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
            
        print("ExtracciÃ³n completada")
        
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Error: {e}")
    finally:
        driver.quit()

"""
EXTRACTOR DE CHATS DEEPSEEK - SIN EXTENSIÃ“N
Extrae los chats directamente del DOM
"""

import time
import json
import os
from datetime import datetime
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By
from selenium.webdriver.support.ui import WebDriverWait
from selenium.webdriver.support import expected_conditions as EC

def setup_chrome():
    chrome_options = Options()
    chrome_options.add_argument("--disable-blink-features=AutomationControlled")
    return webdriver.Chrome(options=chrome_options)

def get_chat_list(driver):
    """Obtiene la lista de chats del historial"""
    print("Obteniendo lista de chats...")
    # Intentar abrir el historial si es necesario
    try:
        history_btn = driver.find_element(By.XPATH, "//button[contains(., 'History') or contains(., 'historial')]")
        history_btn.click()
        time.sleep(2)
    except:
        print("No se pudo encontrar el botÃ³n de historial. Asumiendo que ya estÃ¡ abierto.")
    
    # Obtener los elementos de chat
    chat_elements = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, "//div[contains(@class, 'chat-item') or contains(@class, 'history-item') or contains(@class, 'conversation')]")
    if not chat_elements:
        # Intentar con otro selector
        chat_elements = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, "//div[role='button']")
    
    print(f"Se encontraron {len(chat_elements)} chats.")
    return chat_elements

def extract_chat_content(driver):
    """Extrae el contenido del chat actual"""
    print("Extrayendo contenido del chat...")
    messages = []
    try:
        # Esperar a que carguen los mensajes
        time.sleep(3)
        # Buscar los mensajes en el DOM
        message_elements = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, "//div[contains(@class, 'message') or contains(@class, 'Message')]")
        for msg in message_elements:
            try:
                # Intentar obtener el rol (usuario o asistente) y el contenido
                role = "unknown"
                if "user" in msg.get_attribute("class").lower():
                    role = "user"
                elif "assistant" in msg.get_attribute("class").lower():
                    role = "assistant"
                
                # Obtener el texto del mensaje
                text = msg.text
                if text:
                    messages.append({"role": role, "content": text})
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"Error extrayendo mensaje: {e}")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Error extrayendo el chat: {e}")
    
    return messages

def save_chat(messages, index):
    """Guarda el chat en un archivo JSON"""
    if not messages:
        print(f"Chat {index} no tiene mensajes, omitiendo.")
        return
    
    filename = f"chat_{index}_{datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S')}.json"
    with open(filename, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
        json.dump(messages, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
    print(f"Chat guardado en {filename}")

def main():
    driver = setup_chrome()
    try:
        driver.get("https://chat.deepseek.com")
        input("Por favor, inicia sesiÃ³n manualmente y presiona Enter aquÃ­...")
        
        chats = get_chat_list(driver)
        for idx, chat in enumerate(chats):
            print(f"Procesando chat {idx+1}...")
            chat.click()
            time.sleep(3)  # Esperar a que cargue el chat
            messages = extract_chat_content(driver)
            save_chat(messages, idx+1)
            
        print("ExtracciÃ³n completada.")
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"Error: {e}")
    finally:
        driver.quit()

"""
DEPURADOR DEEPSEEK - Para encontrar los selectores correctos

import time
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

chrome_options = Options()
chrome_options.add_argument("--disable-blink-features=AutomationControlled")

driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=chrome_options)

try:
    driver.get("https://chat.deepseek.com")
    time.sleep(5)
    
    # Buscar todos los botones y mostrar sus textos
    buttons = driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "button")
    print("=== BOTONES ENCONTRADOS ===")
    for i, button in enumerate(buttons):
        text = button.text.strip()
        if text:  # Solo mostrar botones con texto
            print(f"{i+1}: {text}")
    
    # Buscar todos los divs con clases que puedan ser chats
    divs = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, "//div[contains(@class, 'group') or contains(@class, 'chat') or contains(@class, 'history')]")
    print("\n=== DIVS CON CLASES RELEVANTES ===")
    for i, div in enumerate(divs):
        class_name = div.get_attribute('class')
        print(f"{i+1}: {class_name}")
    
    # Buscar especÃ­ficamente el botÃ³n de exportaciÃ³n
    export_buttons = driver.find_elements(By.XPATH, "//button[contains(., 'Export') or contains(., 'Download')]")
    print(f"\n=== BOTONES DE EXPORTACIÃ“N: {len(export_buttons)} ===")
    for i, btn in enumerate(export_buttons):
        print(f"{i+1}: {btn.text}")
    
    # Si no encontramos botones de exportaciÃ³n, puede que la extensiÃ³n no estÃ© funcionando
    if not export_buttons:
        print("\nâŒ No se encontraron botones de exportaciÃ³n. Verifica:")
        print("   1. Que la extensiÃ³n estÃ© instalada en Chrome")
        print("   2. Que estÃ© activa en chrome://extensions/")
        print("   3. Que DeepSeek no haya cambiado su interfaz")

except Exception as e:
    print(f"Error: {e}")
finally:
    input("Presiona ENTER para cerrar...")
    driver.quit()Ejecuta este script y comparte la salida.
